parameters.name: weaviate_version
parameters.description: Select the Weaviate version to use.

options.name: v1.32.7
options.description: Latest stable release with all features

options.name: v1.30.0
options.description: Runtime config management, Dynamic user management, Dynamic RAG model selection

options.name: v1.25.0
options.description: Stable version with Ollama support

parameters.name: weaviate_volume
parameters.description: How should Weaviate's data be persisted?

options.name: named-volume
options.description: Docker will create a named volume called weaviate_data.

options.name: host-binding
options.description: Docker will mount ./weaviate_data on the host to the container.

options.name: no-volume
options.description: Not recommended: Data may be lost on container restart.

parameters.name: text_vectorizers
parameters.description: Select one or more text vectorization modules. API-based modules are enabled by default.

options.name: text2vec-transformers
options.description: Local, high-accuracy model. Requires GPUs to run efficiently.

options.name: text2vec-openai
options.description: Uses OpenAI Embeddings API. Requires an API key.

options.name: text2vec-cohere
options.description: Uses Cohere Embeddings API. Requires an API key.

options.name: text2vec-ollama
options.description: Uses a local Ollama container for embeddings.

parameters.name: image_vectorizers
parameters.description: Select one or more image vectorization modules.

options.name: img2vec-neural-pytorch
options.description: Pytorch-based ResNet50 model. Runs on CPU or CUDA-GPU.

options.name: img2vec-neural-keras
options.description: Keras-based ResNet50 model. Restricted to amd64 and CPU.

parameters.name: rerankers
parameters.description: Select a reranker module to refine search results.

options.name: reranker-cohere
options.description: Uses Cohere Rerank API. Requires a Cohere API key.

parameters.name: transformers_model
parameters.description: Select the specific model for the text2vec-transformers module.

options.name: sentence-transformers-multi-qa-MiniLM-L6-cos-v1
options.description: Recommended for semantic search.

options.name: sentence-transformers-all-MiniLM-L12-v2
options.description: A good all-purpose model.

options.name: sentence-transformers-paraphrase-multilingual-MiniLM-L12-v2
options.description: Recommended for multilingual use cases.

parameters.name: openai_key_approval
parameters.description: The docker-compose file can read your API key from an environment variable OPENAI_APIKEY.

options.name: yes
options.displayName: Yes, set the environment variable placeholder.
options.description: I will provide the OPENAI_APIKEY variable myself.

options.name: no
options.displayName: No, I will provide the key in request headers.
options.description: No environment variable placeholder will be added.

parameters.name: cohere_key_approval
parameters.description: The docker-compose file can read your API key from an environment variable COHERE_APIKEY.

options.name: yes
options.displayName: Yes, set the environment variable placeholder.
options.description: I will provide the COHERE_APIKEY variable myself.

options.name: no
options.displayName: No, I will provide the key in request headers.
options.description: No environment variable placeholder will be added.
